body_html:
@fcacarminati Thank you for pointing out a performance problem. I apologize that this issue fell through the cracks. If I understand your request correctly, you are asking if we could improve performance of
the loop in line 559 of eigen_volume_patch.h.
for (int i = 0; i < PacketSize; ++i) {
values[i] = coeff(index + i);
}
Is this correct?

/cc @ezhulenev @rmlarsen
